VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer
PropertyDrawer
[CustomPropertyDrawer(typeof(SceneReference))]
public
VEvil.​Core.​Editor.​Properties.​SceneReferencePropertyDrawer

Display a SceneReference object inside the Editor.  If the SceneAsset given is valid, provide basic buttons to interact with the Scene's role in the Build settings.

Constants
SCENE_ASSET_PROPERTY_STRING
private const string SCENE_ASSET_PROPERTY_STRING

The exact name of the asset's Object attribute in the SceneReference's object.

SCENE_PATH_PROPERTY_STRING
private const string SCENE_PATH_PROPERTY_STRING

The exact name of the scene's path attribute in the SceneReference's object.

Variables
boxPadding
private static readonly RectOffset boxPadding

The padding of the Box.

Constants
PADDING_SIZE
private const float PADDING_SIZE

The size of the Box padding.

FOOTER_HEIGHT
private const float FOOTER_HEIGHT

The height of the box's footer.

Variables
LINE_HEIGHT
private static readonly float LINE_HEIGHT

The height of the lines.

PADDED_LINE
private static readonly float PADDED_LINE

The line with the padding.
